results.title: Gary's story
results.creator_credit: Rolf De Heer, Richard Michalak and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Gary is between girlfriends. When he meets Sally in the supermarket he discovers that she is between boyfriends so he asks her out.
“What about a cup of coffee?”
“I don’t drink coffee.”
“Tea, then?”
“I don’t believe in stimulants.”
“Milk?”
“Creates mucus.”
From this high point their relationship deteriorates. But Gary’s story has a happy ending – eventually.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rolf De Heer, Richard Michalak and AFTRS

results.title: Freely given
results.brief_description: “This instrument may be freely given, never bought or sold” says violin maker John Godschall Johnson as we see him carving and shaping a beautifully handcrafted violin into its final form.

results.title: Letters from Poland: Sydney, November, 1950
results.brief_description:
In Sydney in 1950 a young Polish woman waits for the arrival of Tadek, her prospective husband. Working as a night cleaner in a city office, she strikes up a casual friendship with the nightwatchman and waits for Tadek.
Cast features Martin Vaughan. Photography and editing by Martha Ansara.

results.title: Roses are red
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Robert Connolly and Marcella Hayward
results.brief_description: Joy and Di are two women on a mission, but Di wonders whether Joy has got what it takes. Joy wonders if she has got what it takes. After all, it’s not easy being a parking cop. Brian thinks it’s even tougher being a flower seller - and the last thing he needs is a parking ticket. Starring David Wenham (‘Lord of the Rings’), Kris McQuade and Jacqueline McKenzie. Original format 35mm.

results.title: Nightride
results.creator_credit: Della Churchill, Martin Murphy and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A masked killer, a series of brutal murders, a confined space, a resourceful young hero and a terrifying confrontation. Nightride cleverly condenses the conventions of the horror film established in Halloween and Friday the 13th into a suspenseful 11 minute film.
results.description: A masked killer, a series of brutal murders, a confined space, a resourceful young hero and a terrifying confrontation. Nightride cleverly condenses the conventions of the horror film established in Halloween and Friday the 13th into a suspenseful 11 minute film.

results.title: A Horse with stripes
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Andrew Ross and Andrew O'Sullivan
results.brief_description: Manicured lawns…immaculate houses…clean streets…but beneath this highly desirable exterior lurks the desperation of the bored, the scared, the paranoid and the violent. And when the tranquil suburban life of the Goldings and the Bates deteriorates into chaos, they choose not to speak about it. Winner of Silver Hugo, Best short drama, Chicago International Film Festival, USA, 1991.
